summary: An ordinance providing for the improvement of the alley in block "C", Denny-Fuhrman Supplemental Addition, being the alley between Shelby Street and Gwynn Place, from Harvard Avenue North to Fuhrman Avenue ; by paving and otherwise improving the same; all in accordance with Majority Petition No. 90264 of the City Council of the City of Seattle, creating a local improvement district therefor, and providing for that payment for said improvement to be made by special assessment upon property in said district payable by the mode of "Payment in Bonds".
